assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was reviewed and determined to be minimal risk by Mayo Clinic’s Institutional Review Board. All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975 its later amendments. This article does not contain any studies with animal subjects performed by the any of the authors.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Implied informed consent was obtained for all individuals who voluntarily completed the online survey.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Participants consented to have their anonymous results used for research.

assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
